snippet: No. 14 Maryland closed out its home schedule with its best game in weeks, an 81-55 rout of visiting Illinois on Thursday night.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Maryland defeats Illinois, 81-55; other men's college basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: No. 14 Maryland closed out its home schedule with its best game in weeks, an 81-55 rout of visiting Illinois on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Maryland Recovers From Its Recent Losses by Trouncing Illinois
headline.main: Maryland Recovers From Its Recent Losses by Trouncing Illinois
